analyzed: milindapañha
sativagga
rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, buddho dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ kañcana sannibha ttacaḥ byāma ppabhaḥ ti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, bhagavā dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja bhagavā dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ kañcana sannibha ttacaḥ byāma ppabhaḥ ti

original: “Kiṁ panassa, bhante, mātāpitaropi dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā byāmappabhā”ti?
analyzed: kim pana assa bhante mātā pitaraḥ api dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgatāḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā kañcana sannibha ttacā byāma ppabhā ati

original: “No cassa, mahārāja, mātāpitaro dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā byāmappabhā”ti.
analyzed: no ca ssa mahā rāja mātā pitaraḥ dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgatāḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā kañcana sannibha ttacā byāma ppabhāti

original: “Evaṁ sante kho, bhante nāgasena, na uppajjati buddho dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
analyzed: evam sante kho bhante nāgasena na uppajjati buddhaḥ dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi

original: samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco
analyzed: samannāgataḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇo kañcana sannibhattacaḥ

original: byāmappabhoti, api ca mātusadiso vā putto hoti mātupakkho vā, pitusadiso vā putto
analyzed: byāmappabho ti api ca mātu sadisaḥ vā puttaḥ hoti mātu pakkhaḥ vā pitu sadisaḥ vā putto
hoti pitu pakkhaḥ vā ati
theraḥ āha
atthi pana mahā rāja kiñci padumam
āma bhante atthi iti
tassa pana kuhim
kaddame jāyati udake āsīyati iti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, padumaṁ kaddamena sadisaṁ vaṇṇena vā gandhena vā rasena vā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu khalu mahā rāja padumam kaddamena sadisam vaṇṇena vā gandhena vā rasena vā ati
na hi bhantā iti

original: “Atha udakena vā gandhena vā rasena vā”ti?
analyzed: atha udakena vā gandhena vā rasena vāti
na hi bhantā iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, bhagavā dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bhagavā dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ asītiyā

original: ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho, no cassa
analyzed: ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ kañcana sannibha ttacaḥ byāma ppabhaḥ no cassa

original: mātāpitaro dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā
analyzed: mātā pitaraḥ dvattisa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇehi samannāgatāḥ asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitāḥ
suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā kañcana sannibhattacā byāma ppabhāti
kallosi bhante nāgasena ati
mahāpurisalakkhaṇa pañho tatiyo
